title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate uniform and snake belt buckle with sword] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate uniform and snake belt buckle with sword] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.3 x 8.1 cm (frame) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather, circle design. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Confederate States of America.--Army.--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. Daggers & swords--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
